# Recap Structure

### Intro
Over the last few months I've created a collection of running related data visualisations. I run regularly so have a keen interest in the sport and wanted to explore what was possible with dataviz. Lastly I wanted to further my data skills so most projects be testing out a new technique.


### Recap Structure
Each viz recap review with the following:
- **AUDIENCE** The people viz was designed for 
- **RATIONAL** The purpose or questions the viz intends to answer
- **TECHNIQUES** The new methods tested and any lessons learned
